name: gns3-mcp
description: GNS3 lab automation with MCP resources (15 browsable URIs) - prefer SSH tools over console tools
long_description: IMPORTANT: Use SSH MCP tools (ssh_send_command, ssh_send_config_set, ssh_read_buffer) for automation - better reliability and prompt detection. Console tools (send_console, read_console) only for initial SSH setup or troubleshooting. Version 0.13.0: NEW - 15 MCP resources for browsable state (gns3://projects/, gns3://sessions/ssh/{node}, etc.) providing better IDE integration and discoverability. Query tools deprecated (will be removed in v0.14.0). Version 0.12.4: ENHANCED - Added SSH vs Console tool selection guidance. FIXED - configure_ssh error messages now properly distinguish SSH connection errors from server errors. Version 0.12.3: FIXED - send_and_wait_console accumulates all output. Version 0.12.2: FIXED - list_nodes returns lightweight NodeSummary. Supports GNS3 v3 API.

gns3_host.title: GNS3 Server Host
gns3_host.description: GNS3 server hostname or IP address

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all GNS3 projects (returns JSON array of ProjectInfo)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a GNS3 project by name (returns JSON ProjectInfo)

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in current project with basic info (returns JSON array of NodeSummary - lightweight, use get_node_details for full info)

tools.name: get_node_details
tools.description: Get detailed node information including ports, hardware, position (returns JSON NodeInfo)

tools.name: get_links
tools.description: List all network links with adapters/ports (returns JSON array of LinkInfo)

tools.name: set_node
tools.description: Configure node properties and/or control state (returns JSON status message)

tools.name: send_console
tools.description: Send commands to node console (returns status string, auto-connects if needed)

tools.name: read_console
tools.description: Read console output with mode parameter (returns console output string, mode='diff'/'last_page'/'num_pages'/'all', supports pages parameter for num_pages mode)

tools.name: disconnect_console
tools.description: Disconnect from node console session (returns JSON status)

tools.name: get_console_status
tools.description: Check console connection status for a node (returns JSON ConsoleStatus)

tools.name: send_and_wait_console
tools.description: Send command and wait for specific prompt pattern (returns JSON with output, pattern_found, timeout_occurred)

tools.name: send_keystroke
tools.description: Send special keystroke to console (returns status string)

tools.name: set_connection
tools.description: Batch manage network connections with two-phase validation (returns JSON OperationResult)

tools.name: delete_node
tools.description: Delete a node from the current project (returns JSON confirmation)

tools.name: list_templates
tools.description: List all available GNS3 templates (returns JSON array of TemplateInfo)

tools.name: create_node
tools.description: Create a new node from a template at specified coordinates (returns JSON with NodeInfo)

tools.name: list_drawings
tools.description: List all drawing objects in current project (returns JSON array of DrawingInfo)

tools.name: create_drawing
tools.description: Create a drawing object (returns JSON DrawingInfo, types: rectangle/ellipse/line/text)

tools.name: delete_drawing
tools.description: Delete a drawing object from the current project (returns JSON confirmation)

tools.name: export_topology_diagram
tools.description: Export topology as SVG and/or PNG diagram (returns JSON with file paths and diagram info)

tools.name: configure_ssh
tools.description: Configure SSH session for device (requires SSH enabled on device, returns JSON with session_id/connected status)

tools.name: ssh_send_command
tools.description: Execute show command via SSH (returns JSON with job_id/output, supports adaptive async with wait_timeout)

tools.name: ssh_send_config_set
tools.description: Send configuration commands via SSH (returns JSON with job_id/output)

tools.name: ssh_read_buffer
tools.description: Read SSH continuous buffer (modes: diff/last_page/num_pages/all, returns JSON with output)

tools.name: ssh_get_history
tools.description: List SSH command history (limit/search params, returns JSON with jobs list)

tools.name: ssh_get_command_output
tools.description: Get specific SSH command output by job_id (returns JSON with full Job details)

tools.name: ssh_get_status
tools.description: Check SSH session status (returns JSON with connected/buffer_size/total_commands)

tools.name: ssh_cleanup_sessions
tools.description: Clean orphaned/all SSH sessions (keep_nodes/clean_all params, returns JSON with cleaned list)

tools.name: ssh_get_job_status
tools.description: Poll async SSH job status by job_id (returns JSON with completion status/output)
